channel.title: Port Forwarding
channel.description: The steps on it suck for this new guide but does anyone have a guide to portforwarding that is better because I moved and need to switch from desktop to laptop, I was using a router that didn't need to be portforwarded but now I am using Linksys, standard. If anyone knows a link to one then that would be great. Thanks

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Stubbz Stubbz
item.description:
@Stubbz wrote:

Well, not everyone has your router…

Check PortForward.com, they will show you how to do it, WITH your router

Read full topic
